revised_title: Case Study: Accidental Death Due to Alcohol-Induced Inflammability
tldr: A woman with a history of heavy alcohol consumption was accidentally set on fire in her sleep, resulting in severe burns and eventual death. The author suggests that the woman's extensive alcohol intake may have rendered her body and fluids more flammable, leading to the tragic incident. This case study highlights the dangers of alcoholism and the importance of understanding the effects of alcohol on the human body.
